tls:text.tls:line: (I am) a scion of the High Lord Gāo Yáng,
(I am) a scion of the High Lord Gāo Yáng,
Bó Yōng was my father's name.
Bó Yōng was my father's name.

sense.def: honorific and poetic term for one's father [also sometimes: great-grandfather][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Yōng was my father's name.

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: On a gēngyín day I went on to get born???.

tls:text.tls:line: On a gēngyín day I went on to get born???.
On a gēngyín day I went on to get born???.

sense.def: by this time, already; after; after a while

tls:text.tls:line: Glorious and great [gěng jiè] were those two, Yáo and Shùn,

tls:text.tls:line: since they kept to the right Way and found the right Road.

tls:text.tls:line: since they kept to the right Way and found the right Road.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:08; SBBY 16; Jin 16; Huang 04; Fu 30; tr. Hawkes 69; You 59;

tls:text.tls:line: And how madly unrestrained were Jié and Zhòu,

sense.def: How true it is that S!

tls:text.tls:line: precisely because they made convenient use of shortcuts and (in the end) got nowhere.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)

tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:18; SBBY 23; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 112;

tls:text.tls:line: And threat the castor plant's fallen clusters with;

tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:18; SBBY 23; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 112;

tls:text.tls:line: And threat the castor plant's fallen clusters with;

tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:18; SBBY 23; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 112;

tls:text.tls:line: I trimmed sprays of cassia for plaiting melilotus,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:18; SBBY 23; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 112;

tls:text.tls:line: I trimmed sprays of cassia for plaiting melilotus,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:19; SBBY 24; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 119;

tls:text.tls:line: 73 I take my fashion from the men of old:

sense.def: men of talent 前脩 "men of talent of bygone times"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:19; SBBY 24; Jin 27; Huang 07; Fu 32; tr. Hawkes 70; You 119;

tls:text.tls:line: I will follow the pattern that Péng Xián has left.

sense.def: follow (a pattern, a model); act in accordance with

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I heave a long sigh, and then I cover my tears,

sense.def: for a long time, for any length of time; forever; in the long run

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I heave a long sigh, and then I cover my tears,

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I heave a long sigh, and then I cover my tears,

sense.def: heave a sigh; usually in 太息

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I heave a long sigh, and then I cover my tears,

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I bemoan that poor man as long as he lives, is suffers so much hardship.

sense.def: feel sympathy and compassion for; feel deep concern for

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I bemoan that poor man as long as he lives, is suffers so much hardship.

sense.def: life, way of life, conditions of life

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I bemoan that poor man as long as he lives, is suffers so much hardship.

sense.def: have much; have many; contain many 多金

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I bemoan that poor man as long as he lives, is suffers so much hardship.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

sense.def: like to, be fond of VERBING [often impossible to distinguish from vt+Nab[act]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

sense.def: use something contextually determinate N1 as N2

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: I may have loved the cultivation of beauty, and made that my bridle and reins,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: but I was so frank, I was slandered in the morning and cast off that same evening.

sense.def: be frank, be straightforward in speech

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: but I was so frank, I was slandered in the morning and cast off that same evening.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: but I was so frank, I was slandered in the morning and cast off that same evening.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: but I was so frank, I was slandered in the morning and cast off that same evening.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:20; SBBY 25; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 129; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: but I was so frank, I was slandered in the morning and cast off that same evening.

sense.def: be discarded (in favour of someone else)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:21; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 136;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet, though cast off, I would wear my orchid girdle;

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:21; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 136;

tls:text.tls:line: For this it is what my heart takes most delight in, [regards as good]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:22; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 138;

tls:text.tls:line: What I regret is the Fair One's waywardness:

sense.def: paraphrastic: the spiritual beautiful one> the ruler

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:22; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 138;

tls:text.tls:line: All your ladies were jealous of my delicate beauty;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:22; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 138;

tls:text.tls:line: In their spiteful chattering they said I was given to wantonness.

sense.def: be given to V-ing, be an enthusiastic V-er; be prone to V-ing

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:22; SBBY 26; Jin 39; Huang 08; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 138;

tls:text.tls:line: In their spiteful chattering they said I was given to wantonness.

sense.def: be extravagant and excessive; be immoderate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:23; SBBY 27; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 143;

tls:text.tls:line: From square and compass turn their eyes and change the true measurement

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:23; SBBY 27; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 143;

tls:text.tls:line: Disregard the ruled line to follow their crooked fancies;

sense.def: guideline; an abstract line (e.g. defining what is right and proper, or between what is legal and what is not)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:23; SBBY 27; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 143;

tls:text.tls:line: Disregard the ruled line to follow their crooked fancies;

sense.def: go after, try to get, try to retrieve

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:24; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 146;

tls:text.tls:line: I alone am at a loss in this generation.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:24; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 146;

tls:text.tls:line: Before I ever would consent to ape their behaviour.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:24; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 146;

tls:text.tls:line: Before I ever would consent to ape their behaviour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:24; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 70; You 146;

tls:text.tls:line: Before I ever would consent to ape their behaviour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:25; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 149;

tls:text.tls:line: How can the round and the square ever fit together?

sense.def: that which is square, a square; something that is square

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:25; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 149;

tls:text.tls:line: How can the round and the square ever fit together?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:25; SBBY 28; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 149;

tls:text.tls:line: How can different ways of life be reconciled?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:26; SBBY 29; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 150;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet humbling one's spirit and curbing one's pride,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:26; SBBY 29; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 150;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet humbling one's spirit and curbing one's pride,

sense.def: press down, repress, hold down, keep down, curb

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:26; SBBY 29; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 150;

tls:text.tls:line: Bearing blame humbly and enduring insults,

sense.def: be able to endure or sustain (pain, adversity); put up with (objectionable persons)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:26; SBBY 29; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 150;

tls:text.tls:line: Bearing blame humbly and enduring insults,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:26; SBBY 29; Jin 39; Huang 09; Fu 33; tr. Hawkes 71; You 150;

tls:text.tls:line: Bearing blame humbly and enduring insults,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:27; SBBY 29; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 155;

tls:text.tls:line: turned about my chariot and retrace my road

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:27; SBBY 29; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 155;

tls:text.tls:line: before I had gone astray too far.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: I walked my horses through the marsh's orchid-covered margin;

sense.def: cause to walk, make pace along (a horse etc)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: I walked my horses through the marsh's orchid-covered margin;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: When stepping forward I did not go in, because I felt I would meet criticism.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: When stepping forward I did not go in, because I felt I would meet criticism.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: And so, retired, I would once more fashion my former raiment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:28; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 160;

tls:text.tls:line: And so, retired, I would once more fashion my former raiment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:29; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 164;

tls:text.tls:line: 113 I made a coat of lotus and water-chestnut leaves,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:29; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 164;

tls:text.tls:line: And gathered lotus petals to make myself a skirt.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:29; SBBY 30; Jin 48; Huang 10; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 164;

tls:text.tls:line: As long as I can keep the sweet fragrance of my mind.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:30; SBBY 31; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 170;

tls:text.tls:line: Higher still was my hat, towering as it was.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:30; SBBY 31; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 170;

tls:text.tls:line: Long was the girlde, dangling from my waist.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:30; SBBY 31; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 170;

tls:text.tls:line: Long was the girlde, dangling from my waist.

sense.def: carry or wear (adornment or other precious item, e.g. a seal, or a belt) on the waist

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 121 Suddenly I turned back and let my eyes wander.

sense.def: let roam freely (one's eyes, or a knife when one is a butcher etc)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: I resolved to go and visit all the world's quarters.

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: I resolved to go and visit all the world's quarters.

sense.def: look upon (somebody); have a view on (somebody)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: The pendants on my belt are all in confusion, multifariously adorned

sense.def: what is worn on the belt; pendant worn on the belt SHI: 青青子佩 "all green are your (jade) ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: The pendants on my belt are all in confusion, multifariously adorned

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: The pendants on my belt are all in confusion, multifariously adorned

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: and the fragrance wafts richly to become more and more manifest.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: and the fragrance wafts richly to become more and more manifest.

sense.def: even more than before; the more... the more; ever more

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:31; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 174;

tls:text.tls:line: and the fragrance wafts richly to become more and more manifest.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:32; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 178;

tls:text.tls:line: With me the love of beauty is my constant joy.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:32; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 178;

tls:text.tls:line: With me the love of beauty is my constant joy.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:32; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 178;

tls:text.tls:line: I could not change this, even if my body were dismembered;

sense.def: limb, limbs; body as constituted by its parts

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:32; SBBY 32; Jin 48; Huang 11; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 178;

tls:text.tls:line: For how could dismemberment ever hurt my mind?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Lifting her voice up in expostulation:

sense.def: LISAO: swear at, vent one's anger at, often as a bystander or not face-to-face; expostulate against

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Gǔn in his stubbornness took no thought for his life

sense.def: neglect one's own person; pay no heed to one's own interests

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Gǔn in his stubbornness took no thought for his life

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: And perished, as result, on the moor of Feather Mountain.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Why are you so broadly orientated and outspoken, and fond of beauty,

sense.def: be frank, be straightforward in speech

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Why are you so broadly orientated and outspoken, and fond of beauty,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns, king-grass, curly-ear hold the place of power:

sense.def: kind of plant, creeper [also a sort of green bamboo][CA]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:33; SBBY 33; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 71; You 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns, king-grass, curly-ear hold the place of power:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:34; SBBY 35; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 72; You 200;

tls:text.tls:line: 137 You cannot go from door to door convincing everybody;

sense.def: from door to door HF 戶說

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:34; SBBY 35; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 72; You 200;

tls:text.tls:line: No one can say, "See, look into my mind!"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:34; SBBY 35; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 72; You 200;

tls:text.tls:line: No one can say, "See, look into my mind!"

sense.def: real underlying attitude; innermost genuine feelings

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:34; SBBY 35; Jin 55; Huang 12; Fu 35; tr. Hawkes 72; You 200;

tls:text.tls:line: Others band together and like to have companions:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:35; SBBY 35; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 36; tr. Hawkes 72; You 203;

tls:text.tls:line: But I look to the wise men of old for my guidance:

sense.def: depend on; rely on; rely on for sustenance or supportBUDDH: take refuge in (Buddha, dharma, sangha, etc.)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:36; SBBY 36; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 36; tr. Hawkes 72; You 210;

tls:text.tls:line: Qi(?) of Xià made revelry and knew no restraint,

sense.def: indulge in one's happiness; feel happily gratified

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:36; SBBY 36; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 36; tr. Hawkes 72; You 210;

tls:text.tls:line: Qi(?) of Xià made revelry and knew no restraint,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:37; SBBY 37; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 221;

tls:text.tls:line: Yì loved idle roaming and hunting to distraction,

sense.def: in an untrammelled way, freely; to one's heart's content

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:37; SBBY 37; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 221;

tls:text.tls:line: But foolish dissipation has seldom a good end:

sense.def: rarely, in only a few cases

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:37; SBBY 37; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 221;

tls:text.tls:line: But foolish dissipation has seldom a good end:

sense.def: come to a natural end, live to a natural end

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:38; SBBY 38; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 223;

tls:text.tls:line: 153 'Zhuó's son, Jiāo, put on his strong armour

sense.def: on the body; with one's body; physically

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:38; SBBY 38; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 223;

tls:text.tls:line: 153 'Zhuó's son, Jiāo, put on his strong armour

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:38; SBBY 38; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 223;

tls:text.tls:line: And wreaked his wild will without any restraint.

sense.def: give free rein to ones impulses; be unrestrained

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:38; SBBY 38; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 223;

tls:text.tls:line: The days passed in pleasure; far he forgot himself,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:38; SBBY 38; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 223;

tls:text.tls:line: Till his head came tumbling down from his shoulders.

sense.def: in conformity with the contextually determinate conditions N (should perhaps be moved to THEREFORE)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:39; SBBY 39; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 226;

tls:text.tls:line: Jiē of Xià was constantly offending the rules of proper behaviour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:39; SBBY 39; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 226;

tls:text.tls:line: And so he came finally to meet with calamity.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:39; SBBY 39; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 226;

tls:text.tls:line: And so the days were numbered of the hereditory House of Yīn.

sense.def: clan, the overall clan; the leading clan; clan as united by ancestral worship and respect for the living representative of the ancestors

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:40; SBBY 40; Jin 62; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 228;

tls:text.tls:line: Following the straight line without fear or favour.

sense.def: guideline; an abstract line (e.g. defining what is right and proper, or between what is legal and what is not)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:41; SBBY 40; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 230;

tls:text.tls:line: High God in Heaven knows no partiality;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:41; SBBY 40; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 230;

tls:text.tls:line: High God in Heaven knows no partiality;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:41; SBBY 40; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 72; You 230;

tls:text.tls:line: He looks for the virtuous and makes them his ministers.

sense.def: gaze down upon, look at from above, survey from above, look at appreciatingly from above; to survey from above, synoptically and without attention to detail, taking in a scene in a sweeping movement, at a distance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:42; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 233;

tls:text.tls:line: 169' I have looked back into the past and forward to later ages,

sense.def: turn one's attention to; pay proper attention to, take cognizance of, take note of; concentrate on (at the expense of other things); be concerned for, worry about 不顧

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:42; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 233;

tls:text.tls:line: 169' I have looked back into the past and forward to later ages,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:42; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 233;

tls:text.tls:line: Examining the outcome of men's different designs.

sense.def: adjudicate, assess; observe carefully; often specifically: physiognomise by examining the whole body and not only the face

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:42; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 233;

tls:text.tls:line: Examining the outcome of men's different designs.

sense.def: critically observe, watch carefully; look over carefully and systematically, make an overall investigation; survey and examine

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:42; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 13; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 233;

tls:text.tls:line: Where is the unrighteous man who could be trusted?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:43; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 237;

tls:text.tls:line: Though I stand at the pit's mouth and death yawns before me,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:43; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 237;

tls:text.tls:line: Though I stand at the pit's mouth and death yawns before me,

sense.def: I for myself, "ich fuer meine Person"; obj: my own person

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:43; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 237;

tls:text.tls:line: I still feel no regret at the course I have chosen.

sense.def: review intellectually; gain a full intellectual survey of, gain an overview of

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:43; SBBY 41; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 237;

tls:text.tls:line: For that crime the good men of old were hacked in pieces.'

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:44; SBBY 42; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 240;

tls:text.tls:line: 177 Many a heavy sigh I heaved in my despair,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:44; SBBY 42; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 240;

tls:text.tls:line: 177 Many a heavy sigh I heaved in my despair,

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:44; SBBY 42; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 240;

tls:text.tls:line: Grieving that I was born in such an unlucky time.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:44; SBBY 42; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 240;

tls:text.tls:line: I plucked soft lotus petals to wipe my welling tears

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:44; SBBY 42; Jin 63; Huang 14; Fu 37; tr. Hawkes 73; You 240;

tls:text.tls:line: That fell down in rivers and wet my coat front.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:45; SBBY 43; Jin 80; Huang 16; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 247;

tls:text.tls:line: I knelt on my outspread skirts and poured my plaint out,

sense.def: express (a promise etc), put forward (a statement etc)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:45; SBBY 43; Jin 80; Huang 16; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 247;

tls:text.tls:line: I knelt on my outspread skirts and poured my plaint out,

sense.def: speech; formal submission, also in written form

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:45; SBBY 43; Jin 80; Huang 16; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 247;

tls:text.tls:line: And waited for the wind to come, to soar up on my journey.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:46; SBBY 44; Jin 80; Huang 16; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 252;

tls:text.tls:line: By evening I had arrived at the Hanging Garden.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:46; SBBY 44; Jin 80; Huang 16; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 252;

tls:text.tls:line: I wanted to stay a while in those fairy precincts,

sense.def: endowed with supernatural efficacy; endowed with supernatural dignity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:47; SBBY 45; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 257;

tls:text.tls:line: To stand over Yān-zī mountain and not go in;

sense.def: press in on, come threateningly close to

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:47; SBBY 45; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 257;

tls:text.tls:line: For the road was so far and so distant was my journey:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: 193 I watered my dragon steeds at the Pool of Heaven,

sense.def: give something to drink (also to horses and dragons)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: 193 I watered my dragon steeds at the Pool of Heaven,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: 193 I watered my dragon steeds at the Pool of Heaven,

sense.def: artificial lake; winding pond surrounding a platform coming close in form to a moat; meandering lake (on the edges of Heaven)深池，曲池；天池

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: And tied their reins up to the Fú-sāng tree.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: I broke a sprig of the Ruò tree to strike the sun with:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:48; SBBY 46; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 263;

tls:text.tls:line: First I would roam a little for my enjoyment.

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:49; SBBY 47; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 270;

tls:text.tls:line: The Bird of Heaven gave notice of my comings;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:49; SBBY 47; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 270;

tls:text.tls:line: The Bird of Heaven gave notice of my comings;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:49; SBBY 47; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 270;

tls:text.tls:line: The Thunder God warned me when all was not ready.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:50; SBBY 48; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 274;

tls:text.tls:line: And fly ever onward by night and by day.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:50; SBBY 48; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 274;

tls:text.tls:line: The whirlwinds gathered and came out to meet me,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:50; SBBY 48; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 274;

tls:text.tls:line: The whirlwinds gathered and came out to meet me,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:50; SBBY 48; Jin 80; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 73; You 274;

tls:text.tls:line: Leading clouds and rainbows, to give me welcome.

sense.def: at the head of 帥雲霓

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:51; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 278;

tls:text.tls:line: In wild confusion, now joined and now parted,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:51; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 278;

tls:text.tls:line: I asked Heaven's porter to open up for me;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:51; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 278;

tls:text.tls:line: I asked Heaven's porter to open up for me;

sense.def: bolt used to lock a gate from the inside

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:51; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 278;

tls:text.tls:line: But he leant across Heaven's gate and eyed me churlishly.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:51; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 278;

tls:text.tls:line: But he leant across Heaven's gate and eyed me churlishly.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 209 The day was getting dark and drawing to its close.

sense.def: time of day[a two hour period during the day]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 209 The day was getting dark and drawing to its close.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 209 The day was getting dark and drawing to its close.

sense.def: cease, cease to operate; desist; relax specifically: relent at (a place)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Knotting orchids, I waited in indecision.

sense.def: tie up; bundle together; (bind together > solidify)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Knotting orchids, I waited in indecision.

sense.def: linger on; wait in indecision, hesitate, dither

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The muddy, impure world, so undiscriminating,

sense.def: murky and dirty (CC); be less than spotless

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The muddy, impure world, so undiscriminating,

sense.def: be (musically or morally) impure or defiled; be (metaphysically) muddied (i.e. soiled by contact with the world)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Seeks always to hide beauty, out of jealousy.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:52; SBBY 49; Jin i1; Huang 17; Fu 39; tr. Hawkes 74; You 2i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Seeks always to hide beauty, out of jealousy.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:53; SBBY 50; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 40; tr. Hawkes 74; You 287;

tls:text.tls:line: Then I looked about me and suddenly burst out weeping,

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:54; SBBY 50; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 40; tr. Hawkes 74; You 295;

tls:text.tls:line: Before the jasper flowers have shed their bright petals,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:54; SBBY 50; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 40; tr. Hawkes 74; You 295;

tls:text.tls:line: I shall look for a maiden below to give it to.'

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:57; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 315;

tls:text.tls:line: With proud disdain she guarded her beauty,

sense.def: safeguard, keep secure; keep to oneself; protect properly; HF 5.2.20: keep (one purposes) secure and secret

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:57; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 315;

tls:text.tls:line: With proud disdain she guarded her beauty,

sense.def: physical beauty; handsomeness; splendour; good looks

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:57; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 315;

tls:text.tls:line: Passing each day in idle, wanton pleasures.

sense.def: indulge in a happy-go-lucky way of life

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:57; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 19; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 315;

tls:text.tls:line: Passing each day in idle, wanton pleasures.

sense.def: in an untrammelled way, freely; to one's heart's content

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:58; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 319;

tls:text.tls:line: 233 I looked all around over the earth's four quarters,

sense.def: gaze down upon, look at from above, survey from above, look at appreciatingly from above; to survey from above, synoptically and without attention to detail, taking in a scene in a sweeping movement, at a distance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:58; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 319;

tls:text.tls:line: 233 I looked all around over the earth's four quarters,

sense.def: the whole world, right down to the most distant places

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:58; SBBY 53; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 319;

tls:text.tls:line: Circling the heavens till at last I alighted.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:59; SBBY 54; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 324;

tls:text.tls:line: But the magpie told me that my suit had gone amiss.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:59; SBBY 54; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 324;

tls:text.tls:line: The magpie flew off with noisy chatterings:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:59; SBBY 54; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 324;

tls:text.tls:line: The magpie flew off with noisy chatterings:

sense.def: turtledove; name of various kinds of birds

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:59; SBBY 54; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 74; You 324;

tls:text.tls:line: I hate him for an idle, knavish fellow.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:60; SBBY 55; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 328;

tls:text.tls:line: 241. My mind was irresolute and wavering;

sense.def: one of the rare bisyllabic morphemes: hesitate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:60; SBBY 55; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 328;

tls:text.tls:line: 241. My mind was irresolute and wavering;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:60; SBBY 55; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 328;

tls:text.tls:line: 241. My mind was irresolute and wavering;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:60; SBBY 55; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 328;

tls:text.tls:line: I wanted to go, and yet I could not. (zìshì)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:60; SBBY 55; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 328;

tls:text.tls:line: Already the phoenix had taken his present,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:61; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 332;

tls:text.tls:line: Where could I wander to look for amusment?

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:61; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 332;

tls:text.tls:line: Before they were married to Prince Shǎo Kāng,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: For the world is impure and envious of the able,

sense.def: murky and dirty (CC); be less than spotless

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: For the world is impure and envious of the able,

sense.def: be (musically or morally) impure or defiled; be (metaphysically) muddied (i.e. soiled by contact with the world)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: Eager to hide men's good and make much of the their ill.

sense.def: cover and hide from intellectual view

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: Eager to hide men's good and make much of the their ill.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: Eager to hide men's good and make much of the their ill.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:62; SBBY 56; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 337;

tls:text.tls:line: Eager to hide men's good and make much of the their ill.

sense.def: bad points, dishonourable points 三惡

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: Deep in the palace, unapproachable,

sense.def: what it inside doors: private quarters; room; rooms of the palace

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: The wise king slumbers and will not be awakened;

sense.def: come to understand what is going on; awaken to realityBUDDH: become enlightened

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: That the thoughts in my breast should all go unuttered -

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: That the thoughts in my breast should all go unuttered -

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: That the thoughts in my breast should all go unuttered -

sense.def: show openly, vent (anger etc); disclose (advanced doctrines)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I endure this until I end my days?

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I endure this until I end my days?

sense.def: how? 焉得儉"How could he get to count as stingy?" 焉辟"how can one avoid?"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:63; SBBY 57; Jin 98; Huang 20; Fu 41; tr. Hawkes 75; You 342;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I endure this until I end my days?

sense.def: be able to endure or sustain (pain, adversity); put up with (objectionable persons)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: 257 I searched for the holy plant and twigs of bamboo,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: 257 I searched for the holy plant and twigs of bamboo,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: And ordered Líng Fēn to make divinations for me.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: He said, 'Beauty is always bound to find its mate.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: He said, 'Beauty is always bound to find its mate.

sense.def: what is beautiful> wonderful things, beautiful creatures 兩美

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: Who that was truly fair was ever without lovers?

sense.def: be refined and beautiful 甚修

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: Think of the vastness of the wide world:

sense.def: the nine regions of the world 揚州，梁州，青州，冀州，雍州，豫州，徐州，兗州，荊州

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:64; SBBY 57; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 348;

tls:text.tls:line: Here is not the only place where you can find your lady.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:65; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 358;

tls:text.tls:line: Go farther afield', he said, 'and do not be faint-hearted.

sense.def: strain oneself in VERBING, do one's best to VERB

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:65; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 358;

tls:text.tls:line: Go farther afield', he said, 'and do not be faint-hearted.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:65; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 358;

tls:text.tls:line: Go farther afield', he said, 'and do not be faint-hearted.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:65; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 358;

tls:text.tls:line: What woman seeking handsome mate could ever refuse you?

sense.def: physical beauty; handsomeness; splendour; good looks

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:65; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 358;

tls:text.tls:line: What woman seeking handsome mate could ever refuse you?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:66; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 360;

tls:text.tls:line: The world today is blinded with its own folly:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:66; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 360;

tls:text.tls:line: The world today is blinded with its own folly:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:66; SBBY 58; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 42; tr. Hawkes 75; You 360;

tls:text.tls:line: You cannot make people see the virtue inside you. (mine! CH)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:67; SBBY 59; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 75; You 364;

tls:text.tls:line: For they wear mugwort and cram their waistbands with it;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:68; SBBY 59; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 75; You 367;

tls:text.tls:line: 273 'Since beauty of flower, then, and of shrub escapes them,

sense.def: gain an intellectual survey of, investigate comprehensively; make a comprehensive investigative survey of

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:68; SBBY 59; Jin 120; Huang 22; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 75; You 367;

tls:text.tls:line: They gather up muck to stuff their perfume bags with;

sense.def: all sorts of dust and dirt

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:69; SBBY 60; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 371;

tls:text.tls:line: But I faltered and could not make my mind up.

sense.def: one of the rare bisyllabic morphemes: hesitate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:69; SBBY 60; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 371;

tls:text.tls:line: But I faltered and could not make my mind up.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:69; SBBY 60; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 371;

tls:text.tls:line: So I lay in wait with offerings of peppered rice-balls.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:69; SBBY 60; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 371;

tls:text.tls:line: So I lay in wait with offerings of peppered rice-balls.

sense.def: work towards, as one's main aim

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:70; SBBY 61; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 379;

tls:text.tls:line: His godhead was manifested by a blaze of radiance,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:70; SBBY 61; Jin 131; Huang 23; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 379;

tls:text.tls:line: And he addressed me in these auspicious words:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:71; SBBY 61; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 43; tr. Hawkes 76; You 3i4;

tls:text.tls:line: 'To and fro in the earth you must everywhere wander,

sense.def: strain oneself in VERBING, do one's best to VERB

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:72; SBBY 62; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 392;

tls:text.tls:line: 289 'As long as your soul within is beautiful,

sense.def: real underlying attitude; innermost genuine feelings

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:72; SBBY 62; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 392;

tls:text.tls:line: 289 'As long as your soul within is beautiful,

sense.def: be abstractly (or psychologically) very beautiful or attractive

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:72; SBBY 62; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 392;

tls:text.tls:line: 289 'As long as your soul within is beautiful,

sense.def: be refined and beautiful 甚修

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:72; SBBY 62; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 392;

tls:text.tls:line: What need have you of a matchmaker?

sense.def: why go on to? (expected answer: there is no reason to go on to...)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:72; SBBY 62; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 392;

tls:text.tls:line: Yuè laboured as a builder, pounding earth at Fù112-Yán,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:73; SBBY 63; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 399;

tls:text.tls:line: But King Wén met him and raised him up on high.

sense.def: run into a person, come to meet a person

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:73; SBBY 63; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 399;

tls:text.tls:line: Ní4ng Qī sang as he fed his ox at evening;

sense.def: sing a song without musical accompaniment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:73; SBBY 63; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 399;

tls:text.tls:line: Ní4ng Qī sang as he fed his ox at evening;

sense.def: sing a melody, sing a song, sing along (should this be vt[oN]???) often to accompaniment on the lute

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:74; SBBY 64; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 402;

tls:text.tls:line: 297 'Gather the flower of youth before it is too late,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:74; SBBY 64; Jin 131; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 402;

tls:text.tls:line: 297 'Gather the flower of youth before it is too late,

sense.def: age, number of years one has lived

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:75; SBBY 65; Jin 148; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Will break it out of spiteful jealousy.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:76; SBBY 65; Jin 148; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 415;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I tarry much longer among them?

sense.def: why go on to? (expected answer: there is no reason to go on to...)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:77; SBBY 66; Jin 148; Huang 24; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 76; You 418;

tls:text.tls:line: Why have all the fragrant flowers of days gone by

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:78; SBBY 66; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 422;

tls:text.tls:line: 313 I thought that orchid was one to be trusted,

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:78; SBBY 66; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 422;

tls:text.tls:line: He overcame his goodness and conformed to evil counsels:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:78; SBBY 66; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 422;

tls:text.tls:line: He overcame his goodness and conformed to evil counsels:

sense.def: the vulgar; the vulgar people; the common people

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:79; SBBY 67; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 426;

tls:text.tls:line: Pepper is all wagging tongue and lives only for slander;

sense.def: superficial eloquence, outward well-spokenness; empty rhetoric

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:80; SBBY 68; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 433;

tls:text.tls:line: Who can stay the same and not change with all the rest?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:80; SBBY 68; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 433;

tls:text.tls:line: Who can stay the same and not change with all the rest?

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i1; SBBY 68; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 438;

tls:text.tls:line: Only my garland is left to treasure.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i2; SBBY 69; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 442;

tls:text.tls:line: 329. I will follow my natural bent and please myself;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i2; SBBY 69; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 442;

tls:text.tls:line: While my adornment is in its pristine beauty

sense.def: when it came to the period when (something happened or was going on)> while (someone was alive)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i2; SBBY 69; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 442;

tls:text.tls:line: While my adornment is in its pristine beauty

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i2; SBBY 69; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 442;

tls:text.tls:line: While my adornment is in its pristine beauty

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i2; SBBY 69; Jin 148; Huang 25; Fu 44; tr. Hawkes 77; You 442;

tls:text.tls:line: I will travel all around looking both high and low.

sense.def: survey; sometimes perhaps: be sight-seeing at

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i3; SBBY 69; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 448;

tls:text.tls:line: Since Líng Fēn had given me a favourable oracle,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:i4; SBBY 70; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 453;

tls:text.tls:line: 337 'Harness winged dragons to be my coursers;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:85; SBBY 70; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 457;

tls:text.tls:line: A long, long road with many a turning in it.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:85; SBBY 70; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 457;

tls:text.tls:line: And the jinging jade joke-bells tinkled merrily.

sense.def: bell fixed on vehicles (eight of them), also on horse-bits, and on knives (!) which was supposed to make a sound like a luán-bird or phoenix

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:85; SBBY 70; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 457;

tls:text.tls:line: And the jinging jade joke-bells tinkled merrily.

sense.def: sound of chirping birds; babbling of childs; resounding of bells

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:86; SBBY 72; Jin 159; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 464;

tls:text.tls:line: At evening I cam to the world's western end.

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:87; SBBY 73; Jin 160; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 468;

tls:text.tls:line: Warily I drove along the banks of the Red Water,

sense.def: follow (the bank of a river); follow along; follow the course of; pass through in following one's course

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:87; SBBY 73; Jin 160; Huang 27; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 77; You 468;

tls:text.tls:line: Then, beckoning the water-dragons to make a bridge for me,

sense.def: give a signal to; command through signals; hold overall command of (an army)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:88; SBBY 74; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 472;

tls:text.tls:line: 353 So long the road had been and full of difficulties;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:89; SBBY 74; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 480;

tls:text.tls:line: When we had mustered there, all thousand chariots,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:89; SBBY 74; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 480;

tls:text.tls:line: Jade hub to jade hub we galloped on abreast.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: But the spirits soared high up, far into the distance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: But the spirits soared high up, far into the distance.

sense.def: travel fast (by horse); race along (in the air, as spirits)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: But the spirits soared high up, far into the distance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: We played the Nine Songs and danced the Shao dances:

sense.def: perform music in public or for others to hear

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: We played the Nine Songs and danced the Shao dances:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Borrowing the time to make a holiday.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:90; SBBY 75; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 4i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Borrowing the time to make a holiday.

sense.def: amount of time; a space of time; the time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:91; SBBY 76; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 491;

tls:text.tls:line: The groom's heart was heavy and the horses for longing

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:92; SBBY 76; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 495;

tls:text.tls:line: There are no true men in the state: no one understands me.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:92; SBBY 76; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 495;

tls:text.tls:line: Why should I cleave to the city of my birth?

sense.def: why go on to? (expected answer: there is no reason to go on to...)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC LISAO 01:92; SBBY 76; Jin 160; Huang 28; Fu 46; tr. Hawkes 78; You 495;

tls:text.tls:line: Since none is worthy to work with in making good government,

sense.def: commendable, excellent; of high quality, in excellent condition

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 01:01; SBBY 97; Jin 188; Huang 32; Fu 57; tr. Hawkes 102;

tls:text.tls:line: Reverently we come to delight the Lord on High.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 01:02; SBBY 98; Jin 190; Huang 32; Fu 57; tr. Hawkes 102;

tls:text.tls:line: Flourish the drumsticks, beat the drums!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:01; SBBY 101; Jin 196; Huang 33; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 103;

tls:text.tls:line: And dressed ourselves like flowers in embroidered clothing.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:01; SBBY 101; Jin 196; Huang 33; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 103;

tls:text.tls:line: And dressed ourselves like flowers in embroidered clothing.

sense.def: blossom; especially: petals 美若英，落英

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:01; SBBY 101; Jin 196; Huang 33; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 103;

tls:text.tls:line: Shining with a persistent radiance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:03; SBBY 102; Jin 199; Huang 34; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 104;

tls:text.tls:line: The god had just descended in bright majesty,

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:03; SBBY 102; Jin 199; Huang 34; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 104;

tls:text.tls:line: He looks down on Jì-zhōu and the lands beyond it;

sense.def: gaze down upon, look at from above, survey from above, look at appreciatingly from above; to survey from above, synoptically and without attention to detail, taking in a scene in a sweeping movement, at a distance.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:03; SBBY 102; Jin 199; Huang 34; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 104;

tls:text.tls:line: Thinking of that lord makes me sigh

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 02:03; SBBY 102; Jin 199; Huang 34; Fu 58; tr. Hawkes 104;

tls:text.tls:line: And afflicts my heart with a grievous longing.

sense.def: be full of longing, be full of yearning

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:01; SBBY 103; Jin 203; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 106;

tls:text.tls:line: The Goddess of the Xiāng

sense.def: Mistress of N, Lord of N

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:01; SBBY 103; Jin 203; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 106;

tls:text.tls:line: Lady of the lovely eyes and the winning smile?

sense.def: attractive; wonderful; handsome, splendid, admirable; illustrious (name); elaborate and beautiful, lavish; of soil: be rich and good; of high quality; (also of sounds:) attractiveIn SJ & HS, 好女 and 美女 appear mainly as temptresses, gift objects that corrupt rulers; in this collocation, 好 and 美 would be "attractive." A very large number of females characterised simpl as 美 are prospective brides. 美 (but not 麗 ) is often used in connection with abstracta, such as deeds, words, customs and virtues. [JP]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:01; SBBY 103; Jin 203; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 106;

tls:text.tls:line: Skimming the water in my cassia boat,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:01; SBBY 103; Jin 203; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 106;

tls:text.tls:line: Skimming the water in my cassia boat,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:02; SBBY 104; Jin 203; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: Of whom does she think as she plays her reed-pipes?

sense.def: blow, blow on, blow at; puff; play (a wind instrument); blow about

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:04; SBBY 106; Jin 206; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 I waft my magic, but it does not reach her.

sense.def: magical effectiveness, supernatural efficiency; divine influence; divinely aided succour

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:04; SBBY 106; Jin 206; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: The lady is sad, and sighs for me;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:04; SBBY 106; Jin 206; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: The lady is sad, and sighs for me;

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:04; SBBY 106; Jin 206; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: And my tears run down over cheek and chin:

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:05; SBBY 107; Jin 211; Huang 35; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: 20 Chip all in vain at ice and snow.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:06; SBBY 107; Jin 211; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: She broke her tryst; she told me she had not time.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:07; SBBY 108; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: In the morning I race by the bank of the river;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:07; SBBY 108; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: The water laps at the foot of the hall.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:07; SBBY 108; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: I through my thumb-ring into the river;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:07; SBBY 108; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: I leave my girdle-gem in the bay of the Lǐ.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:08; SBBY 109; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: Time once gone cannot be recovered:

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 03:08; SBBY 109; Jin 214; Huang 36; Fu 60; tr. Hawkes 107;

tls:text.tls:line: I wish I could play here a little longer.

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:01; SBBY 111; Jin 218; Huang 37; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: Turns on me her eyes that are dark with longing.

sense.def: to squint because of strabismus or near-sightedness

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:02; SBBY 112; Jin 218; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: For a tryst is made to meet my love this evening.

sense.def: the beautiful one (or: the excellent one??)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:03; SBBY 112; Jin 218; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: Over the swiftly moving waters.

sense.def: poetic: flow gently (tears, rivers); billow along (of gases), mostly used in compound 潺湲

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:03; SBBY 112; Jin 218; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: Over the swiftly moving waters.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:04; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 In the morning I drive my steeds by the river;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I can hear my beloved calling to me:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I can hear my beloved calling to me:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I can hear my beloved calling to me:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I can hear my beloved calling to me:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I will ride aloft and race beside her.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: I will build her a house within the water

sense.def: build with earth [SHI]; build from scratch, erect

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:05; SBBY 113; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: 20 Roofed all over with lotus leaves;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:06; SBBY 114; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: With walls of iris, of purple shells the chamber;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:06; SBBY 114; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: With walls of iris, of purple shells the chamber;

sense.def: the outer four walls defining a house; in military strategy: a temporary wall or blockade erected as a defense against the enemy

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:06; SBBY 114; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: Perfumed pepper shall make the hall.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:06; SBBY 114; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: With beams of cassia, orchid rafters,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:06; SBBY 114; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: With beams of cassia, orchid rafters,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:07; SBBY 115; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: A room of lotus thatched with the white flag

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:07; SBBY 115; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 108;

tls:text.tls:line: 30 Shall all be bound up with stalks of asarum.

sense.def: bind; wrap around; entangle with; wrap

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:08; SBBY 115; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 109;

tls:text.tls:line: In hosts from their home on Doubting Mountain

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:08; SBBY 115; Jin 222; Huang 38; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 109;

tls:text.tls:line: Like clourds in number the spirits come thronging.

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:09; SBBY 116; Jin 231; Huang 39; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 109;

tls:text.tls:line: 35 I'll throw my thumb-ring into the river,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:09; SBBY 116; Jin 231; Huang 39; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 109;

tls:text.tls:line: Leave my girdle-gem in the bay of the Lǐ.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 04:09; SBBY 116; Jin 231; Huang 39; Fu 63; tr. Hawkes 109;

tls:text.tls:line: 40 I wish I could play here a little longer.

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:01; SBBY 117; Jin 234; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 110;

tls:text.tls:line: The Great Master of Fate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:01; SBBY 117; Jin 234; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 110;

tls:text.tls:line: Bidding the whirlwind drive before me,

sense.def: whirlwind [[Note incidentally that this binome is not normally used adverbially. Binomes of this sort are frequent. See however ZHUANG 2 who deviates from this rule.]]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:02; SBBY 117; Jin 234; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 110;

tls:text.tls:line: See, the teeming peoples of the Nine Lands:

sense.def: the nine regions of the world 揚州，梁州，青州，冀州，雍州，豫州，徐州，兗州，荊州

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:03; SBBY 119; Jin 240; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 A yīn and a yáng, a yīn and a yáng:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:03; SBBY 119; Jin 240; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: None of the common folk know what I am doing.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:04; SBBY 119; Jin 240; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: I have plucked the glistening flower of the Holy Hemp

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:05; SBBY 120; Jin 243; Huang 41; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: But I stand where I am, twisting a spray of cassia:

sense.def: linger on; wait in indecision, hesitate, dither

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 05:06; SBBY 120; Jin 240; Huang 42; Fu 65; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: But all man's life is fated;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:01; SBBY 121; Jin 246; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: The Lesser Master of Fate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:02; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: But his eyes swiftly sought me out from the rest.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No sorrow is greater than the parting of the living.

sense.def: alive, live; living; occurring during one's lifetime

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No sorrow is greater than the parting of the living.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No happiness is greater than making new friendships.

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No happiness is greater than making new friendships.

sense.def: be more pleasant than; be more delightful than

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No happiness is greater than making new friendships.

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:03; SBBY 122; Jin 248; Huang 43; Fu 67; tr. Hawkes 111;

tls:text.tls:line: No happiness is greater than making new friendships.

sense.def: as a new measure; as a new instance, as a fresh experience; anew, afresh 新相知

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:04; SBBY 123; Jin 250; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: Wearing a lotus coat with melilotus girdle,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:04; SBBY 123; Jin 250; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: Wearing a lotus coat with melilotus girdle,

sense.def: specifically: inner belt; any belt or sash

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:04; SBBY 123; Jin 250; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: Quickly he came and as quickly departed.

sense.def: HUAINAN: in no time, after short intervals; occasionally used verbally: dart forth abruptly

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:04; SBBY 123; Jin 250; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Whom are you waiting for at the cloud's edge?'

sense.def: interface, the point where two spheres or eras meet 天地之際

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:05; SBBY 123; Jin 251; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: I will wash my hair with you in the Pool of Heaven;

sense.def: artificial lake; winding pond surrounding a platform coming close in form to a moat; meandering lake (on the edges of Heaven)深池，曲池；天池

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 06:05; SBBY 123; Jin 251; Huang 43; Fu 68; tr. Hawkes 112;

tls:text.tls:line: You shall dry your hair on the Bank of Sunlight.

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:01; SBBY 125; Jin 256; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Shining down on my treshold, Fú-sāng. [balustrade]

sense.def: horizontal plank in a balustrade or fence; railings

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:01; SBBY 125; Jin 256; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: As I urge my horses slowly forwards,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:02; SBBY 126; Jin 256; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: I heave a long sigh as I start the ascent,

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:02; SBBY 126; Jin 256; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: For the beauty and the music are so enchanting,

sense.def: cause to be happily gratified> enchant; gratify, give satisfaction to, cause to be delighted

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:02; SBBY 126; Jin 256; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: 10 The beholder, delighted, forgets that he must go.

sense.def: look at and enjoy things, look around; behold 觀者"beholder"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:03; SBBY 126; Jin 259; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Tighten the zither's strings and smithe them in unison!

sense.def: beat the drum for an attack

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:03; SBBY 126; Jin 259; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: The spirits, descending, darken the sun.

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: I aim my long arrow and shoot the Wolf of Heaven;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: I seize the Dipper to ladle cinnamon wine.

sense.def: serve (wine); SHI 246: ladle out; ladle from; HANSHU uses the second graph in a literal sense

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: I seize the Dipper to ladle cinnamon wine.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Then holding my reins, I plunge down to my setting,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Then holding my reins, I plunge down to my setting,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 07:04; SBBY 127; Jin 263; Huang 45; Fu 69; tr. Hawkes 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Then holding my reins, I plunge down to my setting,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 08:01; SBBY 129; Jin 267; Huang 47; Fu 71; tr. Hawkes 114;

tls:text.tls:line: The River Earl

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 08:01; SBBY 129; Jin 267; Huang 47; Fu 71; tr. Hawkes 114;

tls:text.tls:line: I ride a water chariot with a canopy of lotus;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 08:01; SBBY 129; Jin 267; Huang 47; Fu 71; tr. Hawkes 114;

tls:text.tls:line: Two dragons draw it, between two water-serpents.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 08:03; SBBY 130; Jin 270; Huang 47; Fu 71; tr. Hawkes 114;

tls:text.tls:line: 10 Purple cowrie gate-towers; rooms of pearl.

sense.def: gate tower; lookout tower by the gate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUGE 08:03; SBBY 130; Jin 270; Huang 47; Fu 71; tr. Hawkes 114;

tls:text.tls:line: And what does the god do, down there in the water?
