tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:09; SBBY 233; Jin 545; Huang 100; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: 33 Great was the weight I carried, heavy the burdens I bore;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:09; SBBY 233; Jin 545; Huang 100; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: 33 Great was the weight I carried, heavy the burdens I bore;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:09; SBBY 233; Jin 545; Huang 100; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: But I sank and stuck fast in the mire and could not get accross.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:09; SBBY 233; Jin 545; Huang 100; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: A jewel I wore in my bosom, a gem I clasped in my hand;

sense.def: grip; hold (a physical object, probably without a handle) in one's hands; abstractly: keep a grip on, hold on to

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:10; SBBY 234; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Genius they condemn and talent they suspect -

sense.def: HUAINAN: hero of the second order; hero

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:10; SBBY 234; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Stupid and boorish that their manner is!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:11; SBBY 234; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: 41 Art and nature perfected lay within me hidden;

sense.def: the dignified, fine pattern a shape makes; dignified cultured appearance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:11; SBBY 234; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet no one knew the things that I posessed.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:12; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Care and probity I had in plenty.

sense.def: be diligent; be meticulous; be assiduous; show diligence

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:12; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: So who could understand my behaviour?

sense.def: behaviour, conduct, way of acting, way of behaviour

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:13; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Tāng and Yǔ lived a great while ago -

sense.def: be distant in time, be far removed in time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:13; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Too remote for me to long for!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:13; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Too remote for me to long for!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:14; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: 53 I must curb my rebelling pride and check my anger,

sense.def: change; change and improve; change and bring under control

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:14; SBBY 235; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: Restrain my heart, and force myself to bow.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:15; SBBY 236; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: I will unlock my sorrow and ease my grief,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:15; SBBY 236; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: I will unlock my sorrow and ease my grief,

sense.def: find one's happiness in; indulge in 娛酒

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:15; SBBY 236; Jin 545; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: And end it all in the Great End.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: The road is long, through places dark and drear, a way far and forlorn.

sense.def: especially in excavated literature standard substitution for tabooed 長: long

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: The road is long, through places dark and drear, a way far and forlorn.

sense.def: be dark and shady, be secluded

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: The road is long, through places dark and drear, a way far and forlorn.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: The road is long, through places dark and drear, a way far and forlorn.

sense.def: way in the sense of distance covered, or stretch to be covered; route

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: The nature I cherish in my bosom, the feelings I embrace, there are none to judge.

sense.def: substantial feelings, basic attitudes (which identify one as the person one is)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:16; SBBY 236; Jin 553; Huang 101; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: For when Bó Lè is dead and gone, how can the wonder-horse go coursing?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:17; SBBY 237; Jin 553; Huang 102; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet still, in mounting sorrow and anguish, I long lament and sigh.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:17; SBBY 237; Jin 553; Huang 102; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: Yet still, in mounting sorrow and anguish, I long lament and sigh.

sense.def: for a fairly long time; all the time CC 永歎; forever

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:17; SBBY 237; Jin 553; Huang 102; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: For the world is muddy-witted; none can know me;

sense.def: murky and dirty (CC); be less than spotless

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:17; SBBY 237; Jin 553; Huang 102; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: For the world is muddy-witted; none can know me;

sense.def: mixed with impurities and sediment; impure

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 05:17; SBBY 237; Jin 553; Huang 102; Fu 110; tr. Hawkes 172;

tls:text.tls:line: that I will be numbered with such as you.

sense.def: be about to, have an intention to (in that way)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:01; SBBY 238; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: I brush back my tears and long stand gazing.

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:01; SBBY 238; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: I brush back my tears and long stand gazing.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:01; SBBY 238; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: Sundered from friends to plead for me, for the road is blocked,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:01; SBBY 238; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: I can frame no message to send to him,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:01; SBBY 238; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: Until the dawn I pour out my inner heart;

sense.def: real underlying attitude; innermost genuine feelings

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: 9 I thought to trust my words to the floating clouds to carry,

sense.def: entrust (something considered valuable N1) to (someone or something N2) 寄x於y

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: 9 I thought to trust my words to the floating clouds to carry,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: Blessed indeed was Gāo Xīn

sense.def: magical effectiveness, supernatural efficiency; divine influence; divinely aided succour

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: To meet the swallow that carried his gift for him.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: To meet the swallow that carried his gift for him.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:02; SBBY 239; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: But I am ashamed to abase my mind and change from what I was.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:03; SBBY 240; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I tamely yield, and end my days in quietness?

sense.def: in hiding, secretely, privately 隱居

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:03; SBBY 240; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I tamely yield, and end my days in quietness?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:03; SBBY 240; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: But I will not alter my course.

sense.def: change; change and improve; change and bring under control

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:03; SBBY 240; Jin 561; Huang 104; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 173;

tls:text.tls:line: But I will not alter my course.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:04; SBBY 240; Jin 567; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 I harness the wonder horse, Qí Jì, and prepare to ride once more;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:04; SBBY 240; Jin 567; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 I harness the wonder horse, Qí Jì, and prepare to ride once more;

sense.def: to someone else, in favour of someone else; someone else; something else

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:04; SBBY 240; Jin 567; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 I harness the wonder horse, Qí Jì, and prepare to ride once more;

sense.def: yoke (a carriage), yoke (horses) to a carriage

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:05; SBBY 241; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: I shall unloose my heart's desire and yield to happiness,

sense.def: be happy; indulge in one's own happiness

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:05; SBBY 241; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: And, following the River and the Xià, find solace for my sorrow.

sense.def: follow (the bank of a river); follow along; follow the course of; pass through in following one's course

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:05; SBBY 241; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: And, following the River and the Xià, find solace for my sorrow.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:06; SBBY 241; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: With whom can I enjoy these flowers that I have gathered?

sense.def: play with and enjoy; deal flippantly with; play around with

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:07; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: And gathered all ready to twine a garland girdle.

sense.def: what is worn on the belt; pendant worn on the belt SHI: 青青子佩 "all green are your (jade) ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:07; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 113; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: But in the end it will fade and be rejected...

sense.def: shrivel; wither and rot away; be rotten and completely dead

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 43 I shall stay here a while and seek easement of my sadness

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: When they are happy they conceal their gladness,

sense.def: furtively, secretly; surreptitiously; quietly without making an overt show of it

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: When they are happy they conceal their gladness,

sense.def: be openly happy; show happiness; be conducive to happiness

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: When they are happy they conceal their gladness,

sense.def: be in high spirits and pleased with the current state of affairs

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: When they are happy they conceal their gladness,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:08; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: When they are happy they conceal their gladness,

sense.def: what lies at the bottom of one's heart, one's innermost sensibilities

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:09; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: 47 Sweet odours and rich savours mingle in wild abundance:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:09; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: The flower and the fragrance come from within my breast;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:09; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: The flower and the fragrance come from within my breast;

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:09; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: If my spirit and substance keep their integrity,

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:09; SBBY 242; Jin 570; Huang 105; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: If my spirit and substance keep their integrity,

sense.def: substantial feelings, basic attitudes (which identify one as the person one is)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:10; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 174;

tls:text.tls:line: But I feared to climb up into his branches.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:11; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus will my body never yield;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:11; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus do I halt in indecision.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:12; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: And never alter this course.

sense.def: change; change and improve; change and bring under control

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:12; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: And never alter this course.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:12; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: It is my lot to live in darkness...

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 06:12; SBBY 243; Jin 577; Huang 106; Fu 114; tr. Hawkes 175;

tls:text.tls:line: It is my lot to live in darkness...

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:01; SBBY 244; Jin 5i2; Huang 107; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 1 Alas for the days gone by! when I was trusted,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:01; SBBY 244; Jin 5i2; Huang 107; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 1 Alas for the days gone by! when I was trusted,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:01; SBBY 244; Jin 5i2; Huang 107; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 1 Alas for the days gone by! when I was trusted,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:01; SBBY 244; Jin 5i2; Huang 107; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And made plain whatever was doubtful in the laws.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:01; SBBY 244; Jin 5i2; Huang 107; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And made plain whatever was doubtful in the laws.

sense.def: doubt of any kind; doubtful cases of any kind MO, Xiaoqu: 決嫌疑

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:02; SBBY 245; Jin 5i2; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 10 I met with slanderers who were jealous of me. [and I resent them???.]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:02; SBBY 245; Jin 5i2; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 10 I met with slanderers who were jealous of me. [and I resent them???.]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:02; SBBY 245; Jin 5i2; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: My lord was full of anger towards his servant,

sense.def: hence: harbour inside one (any kinds of feelings or sentiments) [See also CONTAIN][CA]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:02; SBBY 245; Jin 5i2; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: Not waiting first to make sure wether the thing was so.

sense.def: what is true and what is not, truth; what is right and what is not, right and wrong???

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:02; SBBY 245; Jin 5i2; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: Bemusing him with empty words and falsely deceiving him.

sense.def: cause somebody to be mistaken> cheat; delude; mislead

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 And he, without examining to sound out the truth of it,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 And he, without examining to sound out the truth of it,

sense.def: to submit to a close examination; to investigate strictly Shiji: 考信

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: But trusted the filthy words of my traducers,

sense.def: trust to be true, believe; have faith inalso religiously BUDDH: believe in 信佛語

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: But trusted the filthy words of my traducers,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: But trusted the filthy words of my traducers,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: But trusted the filthy words of my traducers,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: Puffed up his anger and found fault in me.

sense.def: regard as mistaken, consider as wrong

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: Puffed up his anger and found fault in me.

sense.def: me 天厭之may Heaven reject me!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: How innocent was I, his Loyal Sevant!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 20 Yet I was slandered and charges made against me.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:03; SBBY 245; Jin 5i3; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 20 Yet I was slandered and charges made against me.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: I was ashamed of the honest daylight,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And hid myself in the dark to escape from it.

sense.def: be hidden, live in hiding; live in hidden seclusion

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And hid myself in the dark to escape from it.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: I will stand above the Yuán or the Xiāng's dark waters,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: I will stand above the Yuán or the Xiāng's dark waters,

sense.def: Northern speech: very deep pool; deep pond

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And steel myself to plunge in the flowing stream.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And steel myself to plunge in the flowing stream.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 I can bear to destroy my body and wipe out my name forever,

sense.def: cause to go under, bring about the death of

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:04; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 I can bear to destroy my body and wipe out my name forever,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:05; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I express my feelings and show my faithfulness?

sense.def: exhibit (what is basically hidden) for others to see

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:05; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: How can I express my feelings and show my faithfulness?

sense.def: credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:05; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 30 No, I will gladly die, and without repining.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:05; SBBY 246; Jin 588; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 30 No, I will gladly die, and without repining.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard it said that Bó-lǐ Xi(?) was a prisoner;

sense.def: captive, someone who is utterly dependent from or in the hand of someone else

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And Yī Yǐn cooked in a kitchen;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And Yī Yǐn cooked in a kitchen;

sense.def: the kitchen 伊尹烹於庖廚 is NOT: "was cooking in this or that kitchen"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: 35 Lǔ Wàng was a butcher at Zhao-ge;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: And Níng Qī sang as he fed his ox.

sense.def: give something to eat (to persons, occasionally also buffalo)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:06; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 108; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 176;

tls:text.tls:line: If they had not met with their Tāng and Wǔ, their Huán and Mù,

sense.def: make the acquantance of, get together with

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:07; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Jiè Zǐ-tui(?) was loyal; when he starved himself

sense.def: refuse to drink anything, dry oneself out

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:07; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Lord Wén remembered, and hastened after him.

sense.def: come to understand what is going on; awaken to realityBUDDH: become enlightened

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:07; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Lord Wén remembered, and hastened after him.

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:07; SBBY 247; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Lord Wén remembered, and hastened after him.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 45 When he thought of their former close companionship,

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Some men are honest and die martyrs;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Some men are cheats and are never doubted.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Some men are cheats and are never doubted.

sense.def: rare: be deceitful [graphic variant of dàn 誕)

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Some men are cheats and are never doubted.

sense.def: disguise the facts; be deceptive; be less than open

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: You would not look carefully and act upon the truth,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: You would not look carefully and act upon the truth,

sense.def: concrete reality (versus mere name or title); real facts of a matter; material conditions

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 50 But listened to the lies of slanderers.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 50 But listened to the lies of slanderers.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:08; SBBY 248; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 116; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 50 But listened to the lies of slanderers.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:09; SBBY 249; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Who, though he laboured all night, could so discern between them?

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:09; SBBY 249; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Why have the sweet flowers died so soon?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:09; SBBY 249; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Why have the sweet flowers died so soon?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:09; SBBY 249; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: That slanderers and flatterers daily wax in your favour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:09; SBBY 249; Jin 594; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: That slanderers and flatterers daily wax in your favour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: From of old those envious of the good

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Jealous of true beauty's fragrance,

sense.def: be jealous of (erotically or politically) 妒功 妒而惡之

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Jealous of true beauty's fragrance,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Jealous of true beauty's fragrance,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 60 Mó Mǔ preens herself on her comeliness;

sense.def: good-looking, attractive [and loose (Eastern dialect)] (of men or women) LUNHENG 貌體姣好 (of Mr Chen Ping)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: But if you have Xī Shī's lovely face,

sense.def: attractive; wonderful; handsome, splendid, admirable; illustrious (name); elaborate and beautiful, lavish; of soil: be rich and good; of high quality; (also of sounds:) attractiveIn SJ & HS, 好女 and 美女 appear mainly as temptresses, gift objects that corrupt rulers; in this collocation, 好 and 美 would be "attractive." A very large number of females characterised simpl as 美 are prospective brides. 美 (but not 麗 ) is often used in connection with abstracta, such as deeds, words, customs and virtues. [JP]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: But if you have Xī Shī's lovely face,

sense.def: face, especially overall shape of face

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: The slanderer will get in and supplant you.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: I wished to set forth my thoughts and explain my actions:

sense.def: lay out in words; set forth, put forward; bring out into the open

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: I wished to set forth my thoughts and explain my actions:

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:10; SBBY 249; Jin 600; Huang 109; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: I wished to set forth my thoughts and explain my actions:

sense.def: explain something in detail; report in detail; make something clear

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: To harness swift steeds and go out coursing

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: To harness swift steeds and go out coursing

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: And, without bit or rein, try to keep oneself in the chariot;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: And, without bit or rein, try to keep oneself in the chariot;

tls:text.tls:line: Or on a raft to drift downstream with the current

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Or on a raft to drift downstream with the current

tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 70 And, without boat-sweep, try to keep afloat -

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: 70 And, without boat-sweep, try to keep afloat -

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:11; SBBY 250; Jin 600; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 177;

tls:text.tls:line: In comparison it is just like this.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: If I did not fear that a greater ill might follow.

sense.def: OBI 5: ominous sign, ominous event or phenomenon imbued with some disastrous supernatural significance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: If I did not fear that a greater ill might follow.

sense.def: repetition 有再 "there will be a repetition"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 75 With my words unsaid I could plunge into the waters,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 75 With my words unsaid I could plunge into the waters,

sense.def: dive into, throw oneself into; sink into

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 75 With my words unsaid I could plunge into the waters,

sense.def: rush to (a dangerous place); rush forward into (danger, an abyss); brave (dangers etc)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 75 With my words unsaid I could plunge into the waters,

sense.def: Northern speech: very deep pool; deep pond

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 07:12; SBBY 251; Jin 601; Huang 110; Fu 117; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: But for thought of my blinded lord and his lack of understanding.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 1 Fairest of all God's trees, the orange came and settled here,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Commanded by him not to move, but only grow in the South Country.

sense.def: move to another place, move one's capital;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Commanded by him not to move, but only grow in the South Country.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Deep-rooted, firm and hard to shift: showing in this its singleness of purpose;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Deep-rooted, firm and hard to shift: showing in this its singleness of purpose;

sense.def: still more, (before negatives) still less ZUO

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:01; SBBY 251; Jin 606; Huang 112; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Deep-rooted, firm and hard to shift: showing in this its singleness of purpose;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Its leaves of green and pure white blossoms delight the eye of the beholder,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Its leaves of green and pure white blossoms delight the eye of the beholder,

sense.def: leaf of a plant 一葉

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Its leaves of green and pure white blossoms delight the eye of the beholder,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 5 And the thick branches and spines so sharp, and the fine round fruits,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: 5 And the thick branches and spines so sharp, and the fine round fruits,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Green ones with yellow intermingling to make a pattern of gleaming brightness,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Green ones with yellow intermingling to make a pattern of gleaming brightness,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:02; SBBY 252; Jin 607; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 178;

tls:text.tls:line: Its lusty growth to the gardener's art respondent, producing beauty without blemish.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:03; SBBY 253; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: Oh, your young resolution has something different from the rest!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:03; SBBY 253; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: 10 Alone and unmoving you stand: how can one not admire you?

sense.def: move to another place, move one's capital;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:03; SBBY 253; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: Deep-rooted, hard to shift: truly you have no peer!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:04; SBBY 253; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: You have sealed your heart; you guard yourself with care; have never fallen 128into error;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:04; SBBY 253; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: 15 I would fade as you fade with the passing years and ever be your friend.

sense.def: show friendship to, give friendly support to; cultivate the friendship of; treat as a friend; gain as a friend

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:05; SBBY 254; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: Pure and apart and free from sin, and strong in the order of your ways:

sense.def: be frivolous, be licentious; be overly free; indulge oneself; be immoderate

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:05; SBBY 254; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: Though young in years, fit to be a teacher of men;

sense.def: age, number of years one has lived

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 08:05; SBBY 254; Jin 611; Huang 113; Fu 120; tr. Hawkes 179;

tls:text.tls:line: In your acts like Bó Yí: I set you up as my model.

sense.def: be like, be along the same lines as

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:01; SBBY 255; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: 1 Grieving at the eddying wind that shakes the orchid blossoms,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:01; SBBY 255; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: And the faintest notes lead in the full orchestra.

sense.def: lead the singing, be the song-leader

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:01; SBBY 255; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: How noble were the thoughts conceived by Péng Xián;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:01; SBBY 255; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: And who by decieving can succeed for long?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: 9 Birds and beasts cry out, calling to the flock.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: 9 Birds and beasts cry out, calling to the flock.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Fish, by their thatch of scales are told apart;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Fish, by their thatch of scales are told apart;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: But the dragon hides in the dark his patterned brightness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Orchid and sweet flag bloom unseen in solitary sweetness.

sense.def: name of plant NOT identical with the orchid (but like an orchid?)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Orchid and sweet flag bloom unseen in solitary sweetness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Orchid and sweet flag bloom unseen in solitary sweetness.

sense.def: be hidden, live in hiding; live in hidden seclusion

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Only the good man's lasting beauty

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Only the good man's lasting beauty

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Only the good man's lasting beauty

sense.def: lasting, long-lasting CC 永都 "lasting duty". [for a long time][CA]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:02; SBBY 256; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: Only the good man's lasting beauty

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:03; SBBY 257; Jin 616; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: I have written these songs to make my meaning clear.

sense.def: in polite speech: take the liberty of V-ing; humbly permit oneself to, humbly allow oneself to (NB 竊不敢...)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:04; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: 21 The good man nurses his thoughts in isolation:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:04; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: So pollia and pepper I pluck for my lonely dwelling,

sense.def: break off; take off (an ear); have (one's ribs etc) broken

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:04; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: So pollia and pepper I pluck for my lonely dwelling,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:04; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 115; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 180;

tls:text.tls:line: And sigh upon choking sigh I heave

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 25 The tears from my eyes and nose join in a sorry stream;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: All through the dreary wathces of the long night

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Rising, I slowly wander forth,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Rising, I slowly wander forth,

sense.def: do as one pleases, act naturally; be easy

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Thinking the exercise might bring some solace;

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Thinking the exercise might bring some solace;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:05; SBBY 257; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: But a heavy sigh breaks from my sorrowing breast,

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: I would go wherever the wandering wind might blow me.

sense.def: whirlwind [[Note incidentally that this binome is not normally used adverbially. Binomes of this sort are frequent. See however ZHUANG 2 who deviates from this rule.]]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: My heart was leaping like boiling water.

sense.def: leap about (in all sorts of ways)> beat wildly (of heart)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: My heart was leaping like boiling water.

sense.def: SHI: jump up; LIJI: jump up as sign of extreme mourning stump the ground; leap about

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: My heart was leaping like boiling water.

sense.def: to jump up and down, to leap in the water like a fish[to bounce off (like an arrow)][CA]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: My heart was leaping like boiling water.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:06; SBBY 258; Jin 626; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: I clutched my belt and my coat-front to calm my spirits,

sense.def: pat (the back of a horse); touch (the elbow of a person etc)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:07; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: The marsh grasses dry up and break at the joints;

sense.def: to wither, to dry up (and die)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:07; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Than have to endure this sorrow endlessly....

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:08; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 49 The orphan sobs and rubs his tears;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:08; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: 49 The orphan sobs and rubs his tears;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:08; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Who can reflect on this and not feel sad?...

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:08; SBBY 259; Jin 627; Huang 116; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Who can reflect on this and not feel sad?...

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:09; SBBY 260; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Far, far the road stretched, silent and deserted,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:10; SBBY 260; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 57 Sorrow sits dark on me; all joy is gone;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:10; SBBY 260; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: My breath is twisted up and tied in a knot together.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:11; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 61 Deep and dim in the distance, without a limit;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:11; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: In deepest melancholy of unassuaged grief;

sense.def: rare and poectic: anxious and sad

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:11; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 122; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Inconsolable, in sombrest gloom...

sense.def: be caused to be happy> be consoled

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I sipped cool drops of refreshing dew,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I sipped cool drops of refreshing dew,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: And rinsed my mouth with fine flakes of hoar frost.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: And rinsed my mouth with fine flakes of hoar frost.

sense.def: be misty and foggy; flakes of frost

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I went in the Cave of the Winds to rest myself,

sense.def: depend on; rely on; rely on for sustenance or supportBUDDH: take refuge in (Buddha, dharma, sangha, etc.)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I went in the Cave of the Winds to rest myself,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I went in the Cave of the Winds to rest myself,

sense.def: cause to rest, give rest to; reassure; give respite

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:12; SBBY 261; Jin 636; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: I went in the Cave of the Winds to rest myself,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:13; SBBY 262; Jin 647; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 79 I lighted upon Kūn-lún. and peered into the mists;

sense.def: strain one's eyes to look far into the distance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:13; SBBY 262; Jin 647; Huang 117; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: 79 I lighted upon Kūn-lún. and peered into the mists;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: ǐ Wild and tumultuous, without order,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: ǐ Wild and tumultuous, without order,

sense.def: the warp> underlying principles and rules

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Vast and immense, knowing no bounds;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Flowing in currents, now forwards and now backwards,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Dividing ebb and flow into equal periods.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Dividing ebb and flow into equal periods.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:14; SBBY 263; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Dividing ebb and flow into equal periods.

sense.def: SHI 58: agreed time; SHI 66: period of time; predicted period or time; time of an appointment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:15; SBBY 264; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 91 I watched the fiery vapours cloud on cloud ascending;

sense.def: have a good look at, survey, have a look at and enjoy, visit to have a look at, sound out; poetically: gaze at

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:15; SBBY 264; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: I saw them where they condense in the dewy vapour of mist;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:15; SBBY 264; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: I grieved when the frost and snow fell down together;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:15; SBBY 264; Jin 647; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: I grieved when the frost and snow fell down together;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:16; SBBY 265; Jin 660; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 101 I grieve for the high hopes of days gone by,

sense.def: what is past> the past, what has already happened; matters of the past; the first thing

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:16; SBBY 265; Jin 660; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: 101 I grieve for the high hopes of days gone by,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:16; SBBY 265; Jin 660; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: And follow Zǐ Xū for my enjoyment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:16; SBBY 265; Jin 660; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: And follow Zǐ Xū for my enjoyment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC JIUZHANG 09:16; SBBY 265; Jin 660; Huang 118; Fu 123; tr. Hawkes 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: And mourn at the place of Shēn Tu'2s noble end:

sense.def: resilient (behaviour), nobly independent; showing noble resilience

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. Grieved at the parlous state of this world's ways

sense.def: be sad that S, be sad about S

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: 1. Grieved at the parlous state of this world's ways

sense.def: press in on, come threateningly close to

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: 5 Fallen on a time of foulness and impurity,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: Alone with my misery, I had no one to confide in.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: In the night-time I lay, wide-eyed, without sleeping;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:01; SBBY 268; Jin 667; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 193;

tls:text.tls:line: My unquiet soul was active until the daylight.

sense.def: to buzz about; hum (as flies); acc. to K. a loan-word[the word is probably not primarily referring to flying around but to be agitated and without rest (can also be used abstractly)][CA]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:02; SBBY 268; Jin 670; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 13 Restless I paced, with my mind on distant things;

sense.def: to pace (slowly); to walk along at measured speed; trot along;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:02; SBBY 268; Jin 670; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 13 Restless I paced, with my mind on distant things;

sense.def: into the far distance; from a far distance; in the far distance; into the distance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:02; SBBY 268; Jin 670; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: My heart was melancholy and consumed with sadness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:03; SBBY 269; Jin 670; Huang 122; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: And my body, left tenantless, grew withered and lifeless.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 21 In emptiness and silence I found serenity,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 21 In emptiness and silence I found serenity,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 21 In emptiness and silence I found serenity,

sense.def: be mildly happy; be amused; be happily at ease; feel contentment

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: In tranquil inaction I gained true satisfaction.

sense.def: be limpid, tranquil and serene; be unperturbed; be placid (like the sea)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: In tranquil inaction I gained true satisfaction.

sense.def: cause (oneself) to succeed> get one's way

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 25. I honoured the wondrous powers of the Pure Ones;

sense.def: the true man; the man who is true to himself; the man who has realised himself; a person who has truly realised his potential

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: And those of past ages who had become Immortals.

sense.def: admire the beauty of; admire the moral qualities of; regard as beautiful, regard as wonderful

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: And those of past ages who had become Immortals.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: And those of past ages who had become Immortals.

sense.def: generation 三世 "three generations"; one's own time; our own time; (e.g. the present) age, historical period; historical conditions; specifically: a period of thirty years.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: And those of past ages who had become Immortals.

sense.def: immortals [By the way: is this used to refer to a single definite immortal?]

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: Leaving a famous name that endures after them.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:04; SBBY 269; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: Leaving a famous name that endures after them.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:05; SBBY 270; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 29 I marvelled how Fù Yuè lived on in a star;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:05; SBBY 270; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: I admired Hán Zhòng for attaining Oneness.

sense.def: envy and admire the SUBJECT'S PREDICATING

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:05; SBBY 270; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 33 In the ether's transformations they rose upwards,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:05; SBBY 270; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: Sometimes men see them, in remote, uncertain glimpses,

sense.def: into the far distance; from a far distance; in the far distance; into the distance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:06; SBBY 271; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: 37 Leaving the dust behind, they shed their impurities,

sense.def: SHI 54: SHI 204 blameworthy points, faults; mistakes 亡尤

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:06; SBBY 271; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: Never to return again to their old homes.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:06; SBBY 271; Jin 674; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 194;

tls:text.tls:line: But no one in the world knows where they went to.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:07; SBBY 271; Jin 6i4; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Of the Bright God's relentless journey to the west.

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:07; SBBY 271; Jin 6i4; Huang 123; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: I wanted some time to roam in leisurely enjoyment,

sense.def: be at ease; saunter; be carefree; roam; enjoy oneself; have a good time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: 47 With whom could I enjoy the fragrance that was left me?

sense.def: play with and enjoy; deal flippantly with; play around with

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: 47 With whom could I enjoy the fragrance that was left me?

sense.def: this (modifying non-concrete objects) 斯文, 斯道

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: 47 With whom could I enjoy the fragrance that was left me?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: 47 With whom could I enjoy the fragrance that was left me?

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Gāo Yáng lived far from me in a distant time:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:08; SBBY 272; Jin 6i4; Huang 124; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Gāo Yáng lived far from me in a distant time:

sense.def: be distant in time, be far removed in time

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:09; SBBY 272; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: I will follow Wáng Qiáo for my delight.

sense.def: indulge in the joys of life

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:10; SBBY 273; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: 55 I supped the Six Essences; drank the Night Dew (hàngxiè)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:10; SBBY 273; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Rinsed my mouth in the Sun Mist; savoured the Morning Brightness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:10; SBBY 273; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Conserving the pure elements of the divine;

sense.def: the higher realm of the purified spiritual world (of the deities, also as represented in the mind of the enlightened person); spiritual magic

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:10; SBBY 273; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Conserving the pure elements of the divine;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:10; SBBY 273; Jin 687; Huang 125; Fu 129; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: I travelled to Nán-cháo in a single journey.

sense.def: once, one time (versus 再 "twice"); at any time; also: 壹陰兮壹陽

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Keep your soul from confusion,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Keep your soul from confusion,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Keep your soul from confusion,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: and it will come naturally; [become all natural]

sense.def: be so of and by itself; be naturally oneself; be natural; come naturally

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: By unifying essence; strenghten the spirit;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: preserve it inside you in the midnight hour.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: Await it in emptiness,

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:12; SBBY 274; Jin 692; Huang 125; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 195;

tls:text.tls:line: this is the Door of Power."

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 73 In the morning I washed my hair in the Gulf of Brightness,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 73 In the morning I washed my hair in the Gulf of Brightness,

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: In the evening I dried myself on the coasts of heaven.

sense.def: I for myself, "ich fuer meine Person"; obj: my own person

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: I sipped the subtle liquor of the Flying Spring,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: I sipped the subtle liquor of the Flying Spring,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And held in my bosom the flower-bright wǎn-yǎn jewel.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And held in my bosom the flower-bright wǎn-yǎn jewel.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:13; SBBY 275; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And held in my bosom the flower-bright wǎn-yǎn jewel.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:14; SBBY 276; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 77 My jade-like countenance flushed with radiant colour [pīngyǐwànyán];

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:14; SBBY 276; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: Purified, my vital essence started to grow stronger;

sense.def: become strong; grow strong; increase in strength; reach one's full strength

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:14; SBBY 276; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And my spirit grew lissom [miǎo] and eager for movement.

sense.def: commit acts of lewdness; commit acts of adultery or promiscuity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:14; SBBY 276; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And my spirit grew lissom [miǎo] and eager for movement.

sense.def: be freely indulgent, be extravagantly free

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:14; SBBY 276; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And my spirit grew lissom [miǎo] and eager for movement.

sense.def: give free rein to one's desires

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:15; SBBY 277; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: ī How fine was fiery nature of the south land!

sense.def: esteem highly; experience as exquisite, find exquisiste; appreciate as exquisite

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:15; SBBY 277; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: ī How fine was fiery nature of the south land!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:15; SBBY 277; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: How lovely the winter blooming of the cassia!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:15; SBBY 277; Jin 695; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: I restrained my restless spirit and mounted the empyrean;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 87 I bade heaven's porter open up his barrier,

sense.def: bolt used to lock a gate from the inside

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And stand by his gate awaiting my arrival.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: And stand by his gate awaiting my arrival.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: Visited the Week Star and gazed on the Pure City.

sense.def: MENG: go to a place (often to attend court or pay a visit to a superior); reach (a place)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: Visited the Week Star and gazed on the Pure City.

sense.def: have a good look at, survey, have a look at and enjoy, visit to have a look at, sound out; poetically: gaze at

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:16; SBBY 277; Jin 704; Huang 126; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: Visited the Week Star and gazed on the Pure City.

sense.def: major administrative and ritual centre, local centre at the lower administrative level immediately below the state capital

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:17; SBBY 278; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 95 I marshalled in order my ten thousand chariots:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:17; SBBY 278; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 99 The standards we carried bore rainbow devices:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:17; SBBY 278; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 196;

tls:text.tls:line: 99 The standards we carried bore rainbow devices:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:18; SBBY 279; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: I grasped the reins and, with my whip, I signalled the direction:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:18; SBBY 279; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: I grasped the reins and, with my whip, I signalled the direction:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:18; SBBY 279; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: I grasped the reins and, with my whip, I signalled the direction:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:18; SBBY 279; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 107 We crossed the eastern heaven, wheeling to the right hand.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:19; SBBY 280; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 111 The Wind God meanwhile was riding on ahead,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:19; SBBY 280; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Clearing the dust away to make it clean and cool.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:19; SBBY 280; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Drifting on the moving waves of the fleeting mist.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:20; SBBY 2i1; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 119 The daylight was fading and darkness was gathering

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:20; SBBY 2i1; Jin 704; Huang 127; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 119 The daylight was fading and darkness was gathering

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: We slowed down the pace as we crossed the height of heaven.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 127 I wanted to leave for good, to forget about returning:

sense.def: transcend this world, reach enlightenment 超脫塵世為仙。《楚辭‧遠游》："欲度世以忘歸兮，意姿睢以擔撟。" 洪興祖 補注："度世，謂僊去也。"

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: A boundless satisfaction suffused my inner being:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: A boundless satisfaction suffused my inner being:

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be excellent and admirable

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: I wanted to yield to this voluptuous contentment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:21; SBBY 2i2; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 130; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: I wanted to yield to this voluptuous contentment.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 131 Traversing the blue sky, I was wandering freely,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: 135 I pictured my dear ones in imagination,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: And, with a heavy sigh, I brushed the tears away.

sense.def: sigh (as a sign of hightened emotion)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: And, with a heavy sigh, I brushed the tears away.

sense.def: tears (perhaps with an admixture of snivel)

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Then slowly I drifted on, rising even higher,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Then slowly I drifted on, rising even higher,

sense.def: into the mystical distance; into the distance

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:22; SBBY 2i3; Jin 718; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Supressing these wilful thoughts, in control once more.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:23; SBBY 2i3; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: 139 Pointing to the Fiery God, I made a straight line towards him:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:23; SBBY 2i3; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: I gazed into the emptiness there, beyond the world's end;

sense.def: run one's eyes all over and appreciate, survey all over with appreciation

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:23; SBBY 2i3; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: Then onwards still I floated, over that watery vastness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:23; SBBY 2i3; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: 143 But Zhù Róng stood in my way, warning me to turn back.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:24; SBBY 2i4; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

sense.def: the soul of a deceased person (especially insofar as it is endowed with a supernatural efficacy); spirit; deity

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:24; SBBY 2i4; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: They lined water monsters up to join them in the dance:

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:24; SBBY 2i4; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: They lined water monsters up to join them in the dance:

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:24; SBBY 2i4; Jin 723; Huang 128; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: How their bodies coiled and writhed in undulating motion!

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:25; SBBY 285; Jin 724; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: 151 Gracefully the woman-rainbow made circles round them;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:25; SBBY 285; Jin 724; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: Phoenixes soarded up and hovered overhead.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:25; SBBY 285; Jin 724; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: After that I left them and resumed my wandering.

sense.def: walk back and forth in hesitation; occasionally: be plagued by hesitation

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: 155 All keeping close in step, on and on we galloped,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: Till, at the world's other end, we came to the Gate of Coldness.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: There I raced the rushing wind to the Freezing Fountain;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: There I raced the rushing wind to the Freezing Fountain;

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: There I raced the rushing wind to the Freezing Fountain;

sense.def: cosmic border; CC: 唼o small that there is nothing inside, so large that there are no outer bounds�; CC, jiutan: the mountains are so large, there is no end/boundary to them

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:26; SBBY 286; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: I followed Zhuān Xū over the piled-up ice.

sense.def: ice; layer of ice; iced water

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:27; SBBY 287; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: 163 I toured the Four Outlands,

sense.def: to wander about; to roam in; traverse (CC); usually in the compound 經營

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:27; SBBY 287; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: Up to the lightning's fissure,

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:27; SBBY 287; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 198;

tls:text.tls:line: And down to the Great Abyss.

tls:line.title: 楚辭(en)
tls:line.loc: CC YUANYOU 01:28; SBBY 287; Jin 731; Huang 129; Fu 131; tr. Hawkes 199;
